metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48619 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in drivers/input/input.c in the Linux kernel before5.17.10. An attacker can cause a denial of service (panic) becauseinput_set_capability mishandles the situation in which an event code fallsoutside of a bitmap.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
